Reviews.Content: stayed tulip riverside 4 nights nice hotel sized clean comfortable plenty storage clean comfortable bed clean bathroom desk table chairs front overlooking main road issues noise staff friendly helpful especially breakfast scrambled eggs bacon cereals fresh fruit salad bread rolls cheeses ham plenty teacoffee city centre taxi approx â‚¬30 bad sharing evening meals dont mind location recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Hotel which you should avoid.”

Reviews.Content: tulip riverside attending conference amsterdam medical centre following experience 1 excellent parking space 2 reception counter poor service booked advance chaos arrival 3 lack fridge coffee mug heater wasnt shower kept leaking bathroom wet perpetually close road noise level occasionally woken internet facility wasnt available service abysmal safe locker charging inconvenient 4 food breakfastnot mark 3 star hotel cant omelette breakfast dunno lunch dinner 5 location 20 minutes walk closest station takes 30 euros amsterdam central 6 value money poor pay price 3 star service facility overall conclusion avoid hotel
